articles.title: High Court stopped release of RGV's Vhyuham movie - Deccan Chronicle
articles.description: High Court stopped release of RGV's Vhyuham movie
articles.content: With the High Court's suspension of the censor certificate, the film will not be released in theatres as scheduled on Friday. DC Image
